short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check RuneScape's latests updates and take a look at your friends adventurer's log !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension keeps you updated on the latests RuneScape updates. It also lets you search for anybody's adventurer's log, providing it is not on private mode. In the news tab, you can always click on each update to get redirected to the official RuneScape post, on the official website. The extension requires storage permission to keep your last player search when you open the extension back.

Jagex® and RuneScape® are registered and/or unregistered trade marks of Jagex Limited in the United Kingdom, the United States and other countries. I have no affiliation with Jagex.

RuneScape-related media is created by Jagex Ltd.

CSS styling is based on the official RuneScape Website.
